author: Kelli
name: Teal Blue + Black
description:
Highlights:

  • semi-transparent
  • mostly black with a little teal blue thrown in for good measure
  • includes: cinnamon, gtk, and window themes

I hope you enjoy this theme, I'm new to linux (installed Ubuntu 11.10 in April:) and I'm also very new to css, or any programing for that matter so any help or constructive criticism would be really appreciated=)

Change Log:

  • version 1.2: added gradient to title bar, change title color to gray
  • version 1.2: changed unity panel color from teal blue to black
